items.title: Blackmagic’s free camera app can now stream directly to YouTube and Twitch
items.summary: Blackmagic released an update to its free camera app with some new features that streamers and professional broadcasters will appreciate. items.title: I tried the Apple Crossbody Strap. It’s convenient, but the phone looks silly when the strap is removed
items.summary: Apple's new Crossbody Strap is a convenient way to go hands free but the strap can rub uncomfortably at times, and the phone looks silly when the strap is removed.

If you don’t want to spend a lot on a capable charger to quickly top up your iPhone, then this Baseus Picogo 67W unit should get the job done for less. It offers two Type-C and a single USB-A port, and it’s also quite compact and has foldable prongs that make it super easy to carry around.

items.title: Let Anker’s premium eufy Omni S1 Pro hydrojet robot vac and mop tackle floors at its $800 low (Save $500+)
items.summary:
By way of its official eufy Amazon storefront, Anker is offering another chance to score its Omni S1 Pro HydroJet Robot Vacuum and Mop at $799.99 shipped, matching the price we’re seeing directly from the brand’s website. While it spent the first part of 2025 regularly returning to its $1,500 full price, since mid-May it’s been keeping lower at $1,300, with discounts having mostly kept the costs down between $1,000 and $950, with a fall lower to $900 in late September. Last month’s Prime Day event saw this new low price first appear, with today’s deal bringing another chance at scoring $500 off the going rate ($700 off the MSRP) for the best price we have tracked on this highly advanced cleaner.

items.summary:
Walmart has already teased some of its upcoming Black Friday 2025 deals, and we now have another sneak peek as we get closer to the big sale next week. This fresh batch of offers will officially go live on November 14 as part of the first of Walmart’s three Black Friday and Cyber Monday events, bringing discounts of up to $800 on everything from LEGO sets and Apple gear to TVs and more. With other retailers like Best Buy also rolling out early Black Friday deals, it’s clear the holiday shopping season is kicking off ahead of schedule. Here’s an early look at what’s coming.

items.title: Denmark's government has reached a political agreement to ban social media access for anyone under 15, with a possible parental consent exception from age 13 (Euronews)
items.summary:
Euronews:
Denmark's government has reached a political agreement to ban social media access for anyone under 15, with a possible parental consent exception from age 13  —  The proposal would be one of the most sweeping steps yet by a European country to curb social media use among young people.

items.title: CHEFMAN’s Indoor Pizza Oven comes with a stone and peel for your favorite styles at a new $160 low (Reg. up to $400)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the CHEFMAN Stainless Black Indoor Pizza Oven at new $159.99 shipped. While it carries a $600 MSRP direct from the brand, it’s only risen to $400 once over the year at Amazon, while its silver counterpart has been seen up at $500 quite a few times. Things on this black model have more often kept between $350 and $250, and frequent discounts have taken costs to $200, save for the fall to $190 back in late September. Today’s deal is going lower than we’ve seen, as you’re getting up to $190 off the going rate (and a total $240 off Amazon’s highest pricing) that beats the previous low by $30 and lands things at a new all-time low price.

items.title: Black Friday 2025 deal schedule: Best Buy, Amazon, Costco, LEGO, Walmart, more [Update #3]

The 2025 Black Friday deal season is upon us and early details from the major retailers are starting to flood in. This year we are already getting official confirmation from many of the biggest retailers and brands on when you can expect the Black Friday and Thanksgiving deals to begin and it looks like we are going to be getting a full month worth of big-time discounts in 2025. Deals are actually kicking off on October 31 this year and carrying right through to Thanksgiving 2025 and Black Friday with various sale events throughout the month of November.

It typically goes for $140, so you’re looking at a straight-up $50 on it today. The SE model, highlighted here, is technically the same as the standard Superlight 2 LIGHTSPEED, but it comes in special edition colors like the red one highlighted here. The regular variant has never dropped below the $100 mark, so you can essentially score the SE variant to grab a similarly specced variant for less. You can also get this in black and white colors, though they’re both seeing a relatively lighter deal down at $95. Head below for more details.

items.title: For four days, get Heybike’s ALPHA all-terrain mid-drive e-bike with $266 in FREE gear at a new $1,299 low (Reg. $1,699)
items.summary:
As part of Heybike’s ongoing early Black Friday Sale, and running alongside the short-term Ranger S $999 annual low, there is also a 4-day flash sale on the ALPHA All-Terrain Mid-Drive e-bike at $1,299 shipped with it also getting $266 in FREE gear. It carries a $1,699 MSRP, but over the year, we’ve regularly seen it drop to $1,599 and $1,499, with a flash sale that took things to $1,399 last month for the first time. Now, during this 4-day window, you can score a larger-than-ever $400 markdown that drops things to a new all-time low price. On top of this price cut, you’re also getting a steel cable lock, helmet, a waterproof backpack, a large cargo basket, and a gift pack.

items.summary:
As part of Heybike’s early Black Friday Sale, the brand is giving folks a 4-day flash sale on two models, with a surprise price cut on the Ranger S 750W Folding Fat-Tire e-bike to $999 shipped that also comes with a FREE Black Friday gift pack, or you could go with the upgraded 1,000W variant at $1,199 shipped and get the same gift pack. These two models would normally run you $1,499 and $1,699 at full price, which discounts have almost exclusively dropped as low as $1,099 and $1,299 over the year, if not at higher rates. While we have seen the price go as low as $899 and $1,099 in the past, those rates haven’t been seen since last year, making the $500 markdowns here the best prices we’ve tracked in 2025.

items.title: Originally $50 Logitech POP mouse with ‘2-year battery life’ is down to just $20 today
items.summary:
Logitech POP Mouse

Buy for $20 (Reg. $32)

What we love

The Logitech POP Mouse is a compact wireless mouse that comes in fun colors and is great for everyday use. It has quiet clicks, smooth scrolling, and can switch between three devices with a button press. What we particularly like here is the inclusion of a customizable shortcut button that you can set up using the Logi Options plus App. Notably, this also has support for auto-sleep power-saving tech, with the help of which it can last up to 24 months with a single battery.
